DarkMouse::

She woke up a few hours later, in a cold sweat. She sat up in the 
chair and rubbed the moisture from her face. She had been haviing 
nightmares about her death and reanimation experience. She stod up 
and looked around.  She sighed and sat back down in the chair. "Yeah, 
I'll get you Megatron. You sent me to my death and I was fortunate to 
come back. Now it's my turn to send you to the Matrix." muttered to 
herself.  She paced the room a few mintues and tried to calm down. 
She finally relaxed enough to try to sleep some more. She sat back in 
the chair and closed her optics.  She snoozed for a while, but had 
fitful dreams.  She changed into mouse mode in her sleep and curled 
up in the chair. Her tail tucked in under her leg, her whiskers 
twitching.
